name: PiActive DEET FREE Wallet Size Insect Repellent Pump S
categories: DEET FREE Wallet Size Insect Repellent Pump S
description: A nice alternative to DEET-based repellents, the formula contains 20% Icaridin, making it a good choice for children from 6 months to 12 years.Active ingredient is Icaridin 20%, with 0% DEET.Formula is non-irritating, non-greasy and non-allergenic.Provides 12-hour protection from ticks, 12-hour protection from mosquitoes, and 10 hours from black flies.Suited to kids from 6 months and up.Pocket sized 40ml bottle is perfect for bringing along for a day on the trails.
